Key Match Events: Naseem Shah hit two sixes in the final over to win the match for Pakistan by one wicket
Fazalhaq Farooqi's double-strike in the 18th over gave Afghanistan a chance
Haris Rauf and Asif Ali were dismissed in the final overs
Post-Match Reflections: The result brought down the curtain on Afghanistan's campaign and defending champions India's
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was a seesawing, low-scoring thriller
Shadab Khan, promoted to No. 5, released the pressure with some lusty hits
Others: Pakistan won the toss and elected to field
The match was played in Sharjah, United Arab Emirates
